speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about when you first started experiencing these symptoms, and how they've been progressing over time?

speaker: Patient
text: To be honest, it started about 6 months ago, and at first, I thought it was just my body adjusting to a new medication I started taking. But as time went on, I realized it was getting progressively worse, and I'd often feel like I was unsteady on my feet, like I was going to trip or stumble at any moment.

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about when you first started experiencing these symptoms, such as did you notice a gradual decline or was it sudden?
